universe_claims: Carolina A. Herrera creates an exclusive collection of luxury fragrances revealing for the first time the secret ingredients that have long perfumed the Herrera dynasty.
short_description: The Herrera Confidential collection unveils the most intimate and personal memories of the Herrera family through high perfumery. Crafted from the world’s finest ingredients, this luxurious collection of fragrances and oils is inspired by the incredible places, vibrant personalities and treasured moments that have shaped the Herrera universe.
long_description: Carolina A. Herrera transforms her world into a contemporary collection of sophisticated perfumes and oils, revealing for the first time the secret ingredients that have long perfumed the Herrera dynasty.
product_details: The Herrera Confidential collection unveils the most intimate and personal memories of the Herrera family through high perfumery. Crafted from the world’s finest ingredients, this luxurious collection of rich, evocative fragrances and precious oils encapsulates the incredible places, vibrant personalities and treasured moments that have shaped the Herrera universe, from Hacienda La Vega, the family’s residence in Caracas, to Carolina Herrera’s debut fashion show in New York in 1981 and her travels in the Middle East.
top_notes: Carolina A. Herrera transforms her world into a contemporary collection of sophisticated perfumes and oils. The mother and daughter team of Carolina Herrera together created an exclusive collection of luxury fragrances for a man or a woman, designed to capture the essence of the House of Herrera and revealing for the first time the secret ingredients that have long perfumed the Herrera dynasty
heart_notes: Comprised of eight single-note blends, Eaux de Toilette Confidential showcase the savoir-faire of Carolina Herrera, distilling one ingredient in its purest, most potent form.
base_notes: Comprised of eight luminous ingredients in six fresh and enduring scents, Eaux de Toilette Confidential showcase the savoir-faire of Carolina Herrera, distilling a single ingredient in its purest, most precious and potent form. Each single-note blend is a fragrant interpretation of Carolina A. Herrera’s personal memories and emotions.
olfactive_family: Comprised of eight luminous ingredients in eight fresh and enduring scents, Eaux de Toilette Confidential is the olfactory translation of Carolina A. Herrera herself, her emotions, her memories; her own insight into Carolina Herrera. Rare and precious, one ingredient is highlighted per fragrance and distilled in its purest, most precious, and powerful form. universe_claims: Bold and fearless, our bestselling Good Girl and Bad Boy fragrances are the ultimate power couple. Inspired by Carolina Herrera’s unique vision of modern femininity and masculinity, each of these iconic scents features a complex blend of dark and light notes, that reflect the contrasting sides of our personality.
product_details: Bold and fearless, our bestselling Good Girl and Bad Boy fragrances are the ultimate power couple. Inspired by Carolina Herrera’s unique vision of modern femininity and masculinity, each of these iconic scents features a complex blend of dark and light notes, that reflect the contrasting sides of our personality. Good yet bad, exuberant yet mysterious, strong yet sensitive – it’s in our contrasts that our true beauty lies. In the words of Carolina A. Herrera, Beauty Creative Director “It’s so good to be Bad!”.
heart_notes: Born in a flash, our irreverent Bad Boy fragrance boldly represents a fresh, new multifaceted masculinity, paying tribute to men who follow their own path.
base_notes: Born in a flash, our irreverent Bad Boy fragrance boldly represents a fresh, new multifaceted masculinity, paying tribute to men who follow their own path. At once strong and sensitive, confident, and relaxed, the Bad Boy juxtaposes light and dark elements to create an energizing duality that reflects the complex personality of the modern man.
olfactive_family: Born in a flash, our irreverent Bad Boy fragrance boldly represents a fresh, new multifaceted masculinity, paying tribute to men who follow their own path. At once strong and sensitive, confident, and relaxed, the Bad Boy embraces his contrasting characteristics with ease, juxtaposing light, and dark elements to create an energizing duality that reflects the unique and complex personality of the modern man.

product_details: Bold and fearless, our bestselling Good Girl and Bad Boy fragrances are the ultimate power couple. Inspired by Carolina Herrera’s unique vision of modern femininity and masculinity, each of these iconic scents features a complex blend of dark and light notes, that reflect the contrasting sides of our personality. Good yet bad, exuberant yet mysterious, strong yet sensitive – it’s in our contrasts that our true beauty lies. In the words of Carolina A. Herrera, Beauty Creative Director “It’s so good to be Bad!”.

heart_notes: Good Girl is inspired by Carolina Herrera’s unique vision of multi-faceted femininity. Sweet, smart, fearless and fun – there isn’t just one way to define a Good Girl, except that sometimes she’s so bad, she’s good.
base_notes: Good Girl is inspired by Carolina Herrera’s unique vision of multi-faceted femininity. Sweet, smart, fearless and fun – there isn’t just one way to define a Good Girl, except that sometimes she’s so bad, she’s good. Never afraid to be herself, Good Girl challenges the expectations of everyone she meets. #GoodToBeBad
olfactive_family: Good Girl is inspired by Carolina Herrera’s unique vision of multi-faceted femininity. Never afraid to be herself, Good Girl challenges the expectations of everyone she meets. #GoodToBeBad

universe_claims: The Herrera Confidential collection unveils the most intimate and personal memories of the Herrera family through high perfumery. Crafted from the world’s finest ingredients, this luxurious collection of fragrances and oils is inspired by the incredible places, vibrant personalities and treasured moments that have shaped the Herrera universe.
product_details: The Herrera Confidential collection unveils the most intimate and personal memories of the Herrera family through high perfumery. Crafted from the world’s finest ingredients, this luxurious collection of rich, evocative fragrances and precious oils encapsulates the incredible places, vibrant personalities and treasured moments that have shaped the Herrera universe, from Hacienda La Vega, the family’s residence in Caracas, to Carolina Herrera’s debut fashion show in New York in 1981 and her travels in the Middle East.
heart_notes: The Herrera Confidential Collection is a testament to the art of high perfumery, selecting the world’s finest and rarest ingredients to compose unique fragrances of the highest quality.
base_notes: The Herrera Confidential collection is a testament to the art of high perfumery, selecting the world’s finest and rarest ingredients to compose 14 unique fragrances of the highest quality. Showcasing the savoir-faire of the House of Herrera, these luxurious fragrances are inspired by the memories, voyages and places that define Carolina Herrera.
olfactive_family: The Herrera Confidential Collection is a testament to the art of high perfumery, an exclusive collection of 14 luxurious, unisex fragrances composed from the world's finest and rarest ingredients, innovative raw materials and surprising accords. Presented in jewel-like crystal flacons, each of the precious perfumes in this collection is a fragrant tribute to the stories, characters and places that have defined the Herrera universe, from the lush gardens of La Vega, the family residence in Caracas, to the glamorous nights of Studio 54. In an homage to the Arab tradition of perfume layering, all the perfumes in the collection can be combined with each other and intensified with the accompanying essential oils to create a bespoke fragrance as unique as a hand-tailored dress.

Crafted from the world’s finest ingredients, this luxurious collection of fragrances and oils is inspired by the incredible places, vibrant personalities and treasured moments that have shaped the Herrera universe.
long_description: Carolina A. Herrera transforms her world into a contemporary collection of sophisticated perfumes and oils, revealing for the first time the secret ingredients that have long perfumed the Herrera dynasty.
product_details: The Herrera Confidential collection unveils the most intimate and personal memories of the Herrera family through high perfumery. Crafted from the world’s finest ingredients, this luxurious collection of rich, evocative fragrances and precious oils encapsulates the incredible places, vibrant personalities and treasured moments that have shaped the Herrera universe, from Hacienda La Vega, the family’s residence in Caracas, to Carolina Herrera’s debut fashion show in New York in 1981 and her travels in the Middle East.
top_notes: Carolina A. Herrera transforms her world into a contemporary collection of sophisticated perfumes and oils. The mother and daughter team of Carolina Herrera together created an exclusive collection of luxury fragrances for a man or a woman, designed to capture the essence of the House of Herrera and revealing for the first time the secret ingredients that have long perfumed the Herrera dynasty
heart_notes: The Herrera Confidential Collection is a testament to the art of high perfumery, selecting the world’s finest and rarest ingredients to compose unique fragrances of the highest quality.
base_notes: The Herrera Confidential collection is a testament to the art of high perfumery, selecting the world’s finest and rarest ingredients to compose 14 unique fragrances of the highest quality. Showcasing the savoir-faire of the House of Herrera, these luxurious fragrances are inspired by the memories, voyages and places that define Carolina Herrera.
olfactive_family: The Herrera Confidential Collection is a testament to the art of high perfumery, an exclusive collection of 14 luxurious, unisex fragrances composed from the world's finest and rarest ingredients, innovative raw materials and surprising accords. Presented in jewel-like crystal flacons, each of the precious perfumes in this collection is a fragrant tribute to the stories, characters and places that have defined the Herrera universe, from the lush gardens of La Vega, the family residence in Caracas, to the glamorous nights of Studio 54. In an homage to the Arab tradition of perfume layering, all the perfumes in the collection can be combined with each other and intensified with the accompanying essential oils to create a bespoke fragrance as unique as a hand-tailored dress.

brand_short_description: “I have a responsibility to the woman of today—to make her feel confident, modern and above all else beautiful.” The House of Carolina Herrera has embraced the beauty and joy of a vibrant life for over four decades, defining a signature style of bold elegance and modern refinement that continues to guide the House each day.
brand_long_description: “I have a responsibility to the woman of today—to make her feel confident, modern and above all else beautiful.” The House of Carolina Herrera has embraced the beauty of a vibrant life for over four decades, defining a signature style of bold elegance and modern refinement that continues to guide the House each day. Fragrance and fashion collections are approached with a perfect combination of couture detail, mixed with a joyful, spirited energy.
universe_claims: The Herrera Confidential collection unveils the most intimate and personal memories of the Herrera family through high perfumery. Crafted from the world’s finest ingredients, this luxurious collection of fragrances and oils is inspired by the incredible places, vibrant personalities and treasured moments that have shaped the Herrera universe.
product_details: The Herrera Confidential collection unveils the most intimate and personal memories of the Herrera family through high perfumery. Crafted from the world’s finest ingredients, this luxurious collection of rich, evocative fragrances and precious oils encapsulates the incredible places, vibrant personalities and treasured moments that have shaped the Herrera universe, from Hacienda La Vega, the family’s residence in Caracas, to Carolina Herrera’s debut fashion show in New York in 1981 and her travels in the Middle East.
heart_notes: The Herrera Confidential Collection is a testament to the art of high perfumery, selecting the world’s finest and rarest ingredients to compose unique fragrances of the highest quality.
base_notes: The Herrera Confidential collection is a testament to the art of high perfumery, selecting the world’s finest and rarest ingredients to compose 14 unique fragrances of the highest quality. Showcasing the savoir-faire of the House of Herrera, these luxurious fragrances are inspired by the memories, voyages and places that define Carolina Herrera.
olfactive_family: The Herrera Confidential Collection is a testament to the art of high perfumery, an exclusive collection of 14 luxurious, unisex fragrances composed from the world's finest and rarest ingredients, innovative raw materials and surprising accords. Presented in jewel-like crystal flacons, each of the precious perfumes in this collection is a fragrant tribute to the stories, characters and places that have defined the Herrera universe, from the lush gardens of La Vega, the family residence in Caracas, to the glamorous nights of Studio 54. In an homage to the Arab tradition of perfume layering, all the perfumes in the collection can be combined with each other and intensified with the accompanying essential oils to create a bespoke fragrance as unique as a hand-tailored dress.

product_name: Very Good Girl Eau de Parfum
product_description: Very Good Girl Eau de Parfum 80 ml
brand_claims: The House of Carolina Herrera has embraced the beauty and joy of a vibrant life for over four decades. Bold elegance and modern refinement continue to guide the House each day.
brand_short_description: “I have a responsibility to the woman of today—to make her feel confident, modern and above all else beautiful.” The House of Carolina Herrera has embraced the beauty and joy of a vibrant life for over four decades, defining a signature style of bold elegance and modern refinement that continues to guide the House each day.
brand_long_description: “I have a responsibility to the woman of today—to make her feel confident, modern and above all else beautiful.” The House of Carolina Herrera has embraced the beauty of a vibrant life for over four decades, defining a signature style of bold elegance and modern refinement that continues to guide the House each day. Fragrance and fashion collections are approached with a perfect combination of couture detail, mixed with a joyful, spirited energy.
universe_claims: Bold and fearless, our bestselling Good Girl and Bad Boy fragrances are the ultimate power couple. Inspired by Carolina Herrera’s unique vision of modern femininity and masculinity, each of these iconic scents features a complex blend of dark and light notes, that reflect the contrasting sides of our personality.
product_details: Bold and fearless, our bestselling Good Girl and Bad Boy fragrances are the ultimate power couple. Inspired by Carolina Herrera’s unique vision of modern femininity and masculinity, each of these iconic scents features a complex blend of dark and light notes, that reflect the contrasting sides of our personality. Good yet bad, exuberant yet mysterious, strong yet sensitive – it’s in our contrasts that our true beauty lies. In the words of Carolina A. Herrera, Beauty Creative Director “It’s so good to be Bad!”.
heart_notes: Good Girl is inspired by Carolina Herrera’s unique vision of multi-faceted femininity. Sweet, smart, fearless and fun – there isn’t just one way to define a Good Girl, except that sometimes she’s so bad, she’s good.
base_notes: Good Girl is inspired by Carolina Herrera’s unique vision of multi-faceted femininity. Sweet, smart, fearless and fun – there isn’t just one way to define a Good Girl, except that sometimes she’s so bad, she’s good. Never afraid to be herself, Good Girl challenges the expectations of everyone she meets. #GoodToBeBad
olfactive_family: Good Girl is inspired by Carolina Herrera’s unique vision of multi-faceted femininity. Sweet, smart, fearless and fun – there isn’t just one way to define a Good Girl, except that sometimes she’s so bad, she’s good. Her light and dark elements combine for a sophisticated fragrance of mysterious grace, with notes of bright jasmine and rich cocoa. Never afraid to be herself, Good Girl challenges the expectations of everyone she meets. #GoodToBeBad
